summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4430 for the improvement of the alley in Block 5, Montlake Park Addition, being the alley between Montlake Boulevard, East Park Drive, Shelby Street and Hamlin Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 52335, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
